ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the mountains are shifted and become a mirage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The mountains put in motion turning into a mirage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the mountains will be set in motion and become a mirage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The mountains will be driven away and become like mirages.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the mountains will be moved – they will therefore become like mirages.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the mountains shall be moved away from their places and they will be as if they were a mirage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the mountains shall be moved off so that they shall remain a mere semblance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the mountains are set in motion, and become a vapour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the hills are set in motion and become as a mirage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the mountains shall be made to vanish, as if they had been a mirage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the mountains will have been removed away, and they will have become as mirage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and the mountains will be set moving and become a mirage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the mountains shall vanish, as if they were a mirage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the mountains shall be moved away from their places and they will be as if they were a mirage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and the mountains move, and vaporize.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the mountains are set in motion, and become a mirage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:20]   and the mountains are set in motion, dislocated from their positions, and become as a mirage, as fine dust, that is to say, like it in terms of its levity when in motion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the hills are set in motion) on the face of the earth (and become as a mirage.
